website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch range hood that comes with a smooth-flow blower wheel design and other great features.
pros: Bright, single intensity LED bulbs illuminate evenly and are tested in cooking environments to ensure long-lasting quality
Includes hidden on and off rocker switches to control blower speeds and light levels
Two-speed blower control exhausts at 250 CFM
Boasts a forward-positioned Centric inlet to quickly remove smoke and odors
cons: No filters included with the range hood

customer_reviews.title: Does not include filters for use as ventless.
customer_reviews.text: So here’s the good and the bad: The vent hood is attractive and the slate color perfectly matches our GE slate stove. Also the fan is very quiet, and the LED lighting is nice and bright. However, there is only one brightness level for the light, and it is bright. Also, there are no filters included with this unit to use it in a ventless situation! We did finally find some charcoal filters that fit (after some trial and error) elsewhere on Amazon, but they cost almost $50! So add this into the cost if you’re planning on using this as a ventless.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, packed well, no damage. Installed yesterday. Fiance is quite handy so installation was pretty easy. He removed the plate for inhouse duct after reading all the instructions. Figured in his mind how to go about installing. He held the hood in place, I marked the holes, he drilled the holes, inserted the screws. connected all the wiring. Looks awesome, quiet, love the LED lights. Lights up the whole stove top. This replaced a range hood that was probably installed when the house was built in 1977. Sooooo happy with this. Addendum: Ordered the charcoal filters. Tried to post pics but did not see that as an option. Abke to edit and able to add pics.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Summer

customer_reviews.title: Review the product once you receive it.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, the filters looked like someone put their knee through them even though the box was undamaged. I got new filters at no cost but those were also bent, I was able to been them back in, but still come on folks.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clean looking product. A big upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product very easy to install. Only 2 wires to install and a ground. You may not need the brackets. Just screw the holes back up on top under the cabinets. It was super simple. 2 people are recommended for some lifting help. And don’t forget to turn off the circuit breaker and buy a live wire tester for safety. It took only 30 min for my installation. If your doing ductless, you must buy the charcoal filters they sell them as a set.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Strong power and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: The fan power is really nice and strong, the fan vent screens are easy to clean, and the slate finish matches my GE slate appliance perfectly...for a really GOOD price!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bowman

customer_reviews.title: nice looking
customer_reviews.text: the overall features of this hood is great I had an electrician install it about a month later started having issues with the fan I have called the customer service and the problem has been settled quick and easy. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: zelda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but hard to install.
customer_reviews.text: This hood is wonderful: the fan is quiet, and does a great job of pulling odors and smoke outside, and the whole cooking surface is brightly lit by the LED lights. The only reason I gave it 4 stars, instead of 5, is that it was not easy to install. It took 4 people hours. I’m sure a pro could install it an hour. The illustrations in the directions are small and difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: AZ VOL

customer_reviews.title: Bright and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: It would have been easier to install with a second person, but otherwise installed fairly quickly and easily. Lights are bright and cover the entire area of the cook top nicely. Fan is strong and very, very quiet. Wipes clean easily - no crazy inside corners to try to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Chickipu

customer_reviews.title: Lights don't work
customer_reviews.text: First one was significantly dented upon rceipt. Returned it and received a replcement. My contractor installed it yesterday but neither of the lights work. Very disappointed in this item. Would like a partial refund for all this trouble.
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: Loud but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The fan is loud and it has just two speeds the led lights are very bright so that's kinda nice for me but you can NOT dim the lights . Installing for recirculation is pretty easy However you will want to order the filters that are listed with the hood. The ones it comes with are thin and dont use carbon. I bought my hood damaged for 62.99
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Tired of your old Range Hood that seems to do nothing?  Try this one.
customer_reviews.text: This was a *fabulous* upgrade from our previous Broan which came with our house. We love the 2-speed fan, the LED lighting, and a filtration system that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Matt in PDX

customer_reviews.title: Great hood
customer_reviews.text: Love this hood. Looks expensive in person and better than pictures. Purchased thinking I would return but it was significantly cheaper than similar items and tried it. Very happy. Lights on hood are very bright!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed myself!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed hood. Easy to install and the light is very nice as it lit up the entire cooking area. Would have given this hood a 5 star rating but you have to make an additional purchase of the charcoal filters if you vent this inside.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Travis

customer_reviews.title: Needs more suck
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like hood, looks like a hood, doesn’t suck very well. Don’t be roasting any chickens on convect, even with proximal windows open
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, very happy with our purchase. Bonus- the light on it is so bright and really pretty! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Slate matches GE appliances
customer_reviews.text: Matches the GE slate perfectly and the finish wipes off without streaks . Good lighting and the fan pulls a lot of air through.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Very bright led lights. Lights up our stove really well. Slate stainless steel finish looks really nice. Has options for venting from the top.... or top side to outside. I didnt use this option, and fan pushes flow thru the front top, in front of cabinets. Has a real nice clean look to the underside with the mesh filters. I will look into charcoal filters later as some others have suggested. Replaced old 30 inch hood vent easily... very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyFanAlways

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this range hood. The light is very bright, the fan is very quiet, and the design is simple and easy to clean. Ours is connected to an outside duct, so the fan is very effective. Also fairly easy to install DIY. (The hood replaced our over-the-range microwave; the height was a safety hazard for the users in our family.)
customer_reviews.author: Design Educator

customer_reviews.title: Matches the slate GE color perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bright light, great fan, seemed fairly easy to install. Not much to say. Fan is loud but they all are in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! It's attractive, the light is nice and bright, and the fan noise is nearly inaudible.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I give this 3 stars only because there is only one setting for the light. We liked to keep ours on in the kitchen over night. Not with this one. Only one setting and it is BRIGHT! Almost too bright for even cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Built an elaborate custom hood around this unit. Worked out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Longmire

customer_reviews.title: nice but dented
customer_reviews.text: Like the color but had a dent in the front top , very noticeable. Not sure if it’s worth the hassle of sending it back . No box damage so it was placed in there dented . Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: alynch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This hood range works well and is not overly noisy like some can be.
customer_reviews.author: Carl fejedelem

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This range hood looks great with my black stainless appliances. The light source produces more than enough light to cover my stove also.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality good price quiet on low speed but a little noisy on high
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lamps

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful range hood. Lighting is great, very bright and right where you want it. Service for this item is great. Very knowledgeable and fast to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Traver

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, super quiet, and lights are nice and bright! Love it
customer_reviews.author: keepthemaccountable!

customer_reviews.title: Much better value and LED too!
customer_reviews.text: GE charges $400+ for their slate gray LED version. Looks great and installed easily.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Condition of warehouse items
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described. Bought from amazon warehouse, they said the box was slightly damaged but i didnt even see any damage on the box. The exhaust fan itself is in new condition. Because it was used, was 100.00 less than new!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wells

customer_reviews.title: scratched
customer_reviews.text: Hood was scratched on the top. Unfortunately, I didn't see it until after the return window closed. I looked for dents when I received it after reading reviews but missed the scratches. I even showed it to family and friends but none of us noticed until it came to installing.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLou

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were really straightforward and we already had an old microwave fn combo come out of the area so all the ducting was already in place. Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Allard Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: LED Lights are great Noise level on low is hard to hear Wife loves it. most important thing
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Powerful, LED's are very bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 20 year old builder grade range hood. Very happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and easy to install, it needs the 7" vent pipe to work properly. I would buy again and recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Brannon

product_meta.title: Broan-NuTone BCSEK130SS Glacier Energy Star Certified Range Hood with Light Exhaust Fan for Under Cabinet, 250 CFM, 30-Inch, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:30-inch| Size:Stainless Steel| Style:Range HoodUpgrade your kitchen with the Broan Glacier Range Hood! This versatile hood is the perfect solution to your ventilation needs serving as both an exhaust fan and overhead light for your cooktop. The stainless steel unit is designed to fit neatly underneath your cabinets and features the Captur system’s advanced blower design with a forward positioned centric inlet to remove smoke and odor faster. It includes a two-speed blower control that exhausts at 250 CFM. The smooth-flow blower wheel design and high flow filters ensure quiet, 1. 5 sone operation at normal speed. It also includes hidden on/off rocker switches to control blower speeds and light levels. This ENERGY STAR certified unit is equipped with bright, single intensity LED modules that flood the cooktop and surrounding area with generous illumination (bulbs included). It features dual dishwasher-safe, open-mesh filters for easy cleaning and grease removal. The included EZ1 system provides easy single-person installation in up to half the time of traditional methods. For your convenience, this range hood can work in an ADA-compliant application and includes a 1 year limited on the hood and a 3 year limited on the LED module. This unit is non-duct capable with the use of charcoal filters (sold separately) and includes hidden louvers on top of the hood that exhaust away from the cabinetry. Enhance your home today with the Broan Glacier Range Hood!
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY RANGE HOOD: Range hood improves air quality with effective 250 CFM ventilation with quiet operation at 1. 5 Sones at normal speed. The Captur system’s advanced blower design features a forward positioned centric inlet to remove smoke and odor faster.
EFFECTIVE LIGHTING: Bright, single intensity LED modules illuminate evenly and are tested in cooking environments to ensure long life without dimming
EASY CARE: Includes dual dishwasher-safe, open-mesh filters to provide efficient grease removal and a filter clean reminder to ensure they will always maintain a high level of efficiency
VERSATILE: Separate rocker switches control the light and the 2-speed fan for easy use
IDEAL SIZE: Range hood insert measures 30" and should be installed at least 18" above cook top

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
